project_abstract.cdata: The Second Urban Project will assist the Government in implementing its urban strategy and consolidate the basis for sustainable urban development. It fits within the framework for improving Guinea's economic infrastructure. The project objectives are the following: 1) improve key urban infrastructure and services; 2) support new land development operations; 3) develop private sector role, including small scale construction enterprises in provision of housing, land development and urban services; and 4) strengthen municipal governments. To accomplish these ends, the project has the following components: a) priority infrastructure program including upgrading of key infrastructure in Conakry and selected secondary cities; b) support for implementation of a new housing policy; c) continuation of the program to assist the development of small construction enterprises; and d) development of urban institutions including support to improve MUH's (Ministry of Urban Planning end Housing) project management capacity.
